metadata.title: CVE-2023-0921 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A lack of length validation in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 8.3before 15.10.8, 15.11 before 15.11.7, and 16.0 before 16.0.2 allows anauthenticated attacker to create a large Issue description via GraphQLwhich, when repeatedly requested, saturates CPU usage.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
